derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gārlēac, from gār 'spear' (because the shape of a clove resembles the head of a spear) + lēac 'leek'

entry.def: Garlic is the small, white, round bulb of a plant that is related to the onion plant. Garlic has a very strong smell and taste and is used in cooking.

means.word_mean: 1. bulbous herb of southern Europe widely naturalized; bulb breaks up into separate strong-flavored cloves
